urlText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platform 3
content:
The lift between the subway and platform 3 is temporarily out of service.
From Friday 19th January till Thursday 25th January 2024 inclusive, lift upgrades will be taking place at Summer Hill station, closing the lift between the concourse and Grosvenor Crescent. 

Customers requiring lift assistance will need to use the ramp on Carlton Crescent to enter and exit the station.

If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.
subtitle: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platform 3

properties.smsText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platform 3
properties.speechText:
The lift at Summer Hill Station between the subway and platform 3 is temporarily out of service.
From Friday 19th January till Thursday 25th January 2024 inclusive, lift upgrades will be taking place at Summer Hill station, closing the lift between the concourse and Grosvenor Crescent. 

Customers requiring lift assistance will need to use the ramp on Carlton Crescent to enter and exit the station.

If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.
